author: {'steamid': '76561198184640671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1482299530}
review:
** Oculus Touch** 

Great game, its a true masterpiece for the virtual golfing experience.
BUT it is still an Early Access game and it shows that but if your one that can play a game thats not 100% perfect yet then you will like this game.

it does work with Oculus Touch HOW EVER it is a bit fiddly to use the thumb sticks and Click in thumb sticks to emulate a touch on the Vive Wand Touch Pad so its doable but a little bit tricky at times.

Otherwise hands down great golfing experience.

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE Optimise this for Oculus Touch it will be practically perfect then.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969452654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1507777663}
review: This is an extremely solid Golf simulation in VR.  The devs have been very responsive with updates, and they've put out a game that "feels" right.  No direct multiplayer just yet, though you can compete against their previous games (or your own).  When it's too cold to golf outside, this is a fantastic way to visit the links.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993589687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1512720142}
review: love throwing down a nice relaxing round of golf after work!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970662150', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1569686767}
review: This is EXACTLY how a golf game should be in VR. I absolutely love this game! I have played golf in real life and of course this is not exactly the same, but it is still definitely golf! From the swing to the graphics this game is really as good as it gets if golf is your game, then buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967559739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1628985305}
review:
I was waiting on another golf game thats on my wishlist, but this title suprised me out of nowhere.  Wow.  This game is a blast.  I realize now how badly I suck at golf.  But this is a must buy game for any golf fan, arcade or otherwise.

Just buy it, and suck at golf like me.

Bonus points: I get to drink a few while playing in any weather, in the comfort of my own home.  May be better than real golf. Just maybe.

Negative Points:  Really could use a practice range or driving range. (At the time of this review)

Pro-Tip: Turn on sticky clubs in the menu.  Helps when holding the club to simulate a better grip.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067323734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1665941627}
review:
Oculus Rift Review:

Pros:  
 
- The closest thing to real golf that I have ever experienced in a video game.

- Interface is smart and unobtrusive.  Pull the course map out of your back pocket, look at your wrist to see distance to hole, elevation change, wind direction.

- Simulation feel:  Feels like the PC version of The Golf Club only now in virtual reality.  My first couple holes I was swinging very hard and robotic( a problem I have in real life golf) and my shots were all over the place.  Once I slowed down my tempo and started a relax swing I started getting closer to par.

- Sinking a ten foot put in the game is just as satisfying as in real life.  

-  Really fun to play if you like real life golf.

Cons:

- performance is a little bad on a 970, but there are so many technologies implemented and cross talking that I am not sure who to blame.  It is hard to judge how all the different technologies will work together, between OculusSDK, ASW, ATW, OpenVR, SteamVR, SteamVR reprojection there are bound to be some issues.  It is playable but it gets a little choppy.

- a few minor bugs:  Sometimes the drop zone is too close to the water.  Sometimes the ball is too close to an obstruction to get a swing off(might be user error).  The map bugged after the 6 hole, every hole after that only showed the 6th hole map.

- Controls work pretty well but could use some optimization for the rift.  Specifically the button that selects.  In the rift the capacitive button that is mapped to "select" picks up a button touch when it should probably only pick up a button push.


Overall:

If you have a Rift of Vive and like golf, this is a must buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985465723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1481427928}
review:
***Oculus Rift / Oculus Touch***

This is my first review ever. I'll make it short and sweet....

Takes a little getting used to, but man is it compelling. I played a round of real golf earlier today, and although its not true to life golf, it's the next best thing. 

The Oculus Touch controllers are a litte wonky, due to it being otpimized for Vive, but it's not horrible. The menus and the sensitivity of the buttons on the Touch controllers take some finess. You also have to swing much harder than in real golf. I can drive 280-315 yards IRL, but in game I have to swing my ass off to hit 250. Putting and chipping feels satisifying.

Can't wait to get more practice.... This will be a daily game for me.

P.S. If you are an Oculus user and a golf lover, don't be afraid to pick up this title. I just hope the devs focus on some Rift optimizations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036057138', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1481064131}
review: This game is a very interesting idea, however it is pulled off quite poorly. For a physics based game, it has a poor physics engine involving a big half of golf: The clubs. It doesn't help that the few levels that were recommended, even though I picked a lower difficulty level, were all extremely hard. Between the price of VR and this game, you might be better off buying second hand clubs, and pocketing the extra cash. I didn't buy VR for this game alone though, and neither should you. If you want a good golf game, this isn't it. If you want a good mini-golf game, this isn't it either, even though that is a choice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096342118', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1488416494}
review:
This game has a lot of potential. It's basically the best VR golf experience you're going to get at this point. When they first released it, I loved it.

I do like the improvements they've made since its initial pre-release. I wish the course map had your distance to the hole listed on it. As it is, you have to hold down on the d-pad and bring up the watch to see your distance remaining. The game really needs to add DRIVING RANGE and not that island you hit out to during the tutorial. I would also love a place you could practice your chipping and only putting at...just like at a real course.

Lately the stuttering and graphic performance has become dreadful. I have a Intel i7-6700k @4.00Ghz 16GB RAM, 64-bit, running on a Nvidia GTX 1080 FE and high settings with most of the good stuff turned on...brings this game to a screaching halt. There is NO excuse for why my rig shouldn't handle this game without issue. The jutter is headace inducing on the higher visual settings and not playing this on high settings kills all the fun quickly when you know your rig is the top of the line for every other VR title out there. It seems the performance hits are more obvious on the newer courses they've introduced lately. 

There is no game on VR that can touch my GTX 1080 except this one. The game is really fun otherwise, but the performance is killing it in its pre-full-release state.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972416178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1704679299}
review:
Wow.  I'm super impressed with how accurately this game reminds me of how terrible I am at golf.  I have a natural fade that tends to bite me in the ass and oh yeah, it's there.  I can hit solid irons and that's pretty much on par, then I 3 putt for a double bogey or worse.  This game demonstrates all of my short comings in frightening realism.  I've played 18 holes twice, both a little rushed as I had other things to do, but this is an undeniably impressive experience so far.  It's super satisfying to finally hit a decent drive or sink a long putt, just like the rare occasions I do so IRL.  I also get to beat the %$# out of the bag and throw my clubs after I shank a shot just like IRL too.  

If you have any interest in the game of golf, you have to at least give it a whirl.  It's not the real thing, but it's a heck of a lot closer than I ever expected it to be, even in EA.  

The one gripe is the performance.  I have a beefy system with a core i7, 16gb ram, and a gtx1080 and can't bump up from the lowest settings without stutter.  When it comes to graphics it's closer to Euro Truck Simulator than Elite Dangerous so its a tad frustrating to have such performance issues but it's so damn fun to play it's easy to look passed it.  Excuse me while I go hit another 119.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982312414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1538780497}
review:
Wow. Seriously going to spend too much time in this one. Can't wait for new peripherals from third party vendors. I want a clip on tracker for every real club in my bag. Getting feedback from actual stroke performance is going to be huge for real golfing. This could open up chances for legitimate pro trainers. Golf lessons on vr! 

The only complaint i have is that i can't adjust the grip in the game to better represent how I'm holding the controller. It is several inches off. You will get used to it. But please add the ability to adjust the grip up and down to match the controller.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116126575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1494184529}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971195243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1543220063}
review: Most realistic experience in VR that I have come back to more than any other VR title.  Yes the limitations of current gen hardware dont make it feel like you are totally standing at a real golf course, but you somehow realise that the engine and game IS good enough to actually be able to do that if the hardware could better support it.  I really feel like this game could give you total immersion if these were cordless 4k headsets or something.  If you like golf in any way then this is a no brainer to have in your library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017007749', 'num_games_owned': 807, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1479447386}

author: {'steamid': '76561198285064197', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 4864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4522, 'last_played': 1644121405}
review:
So updated review from the official launch!

to start, I was dabbling in this game the night I got home from some drinks downtown. 
I couldnt believe I was about to finally have my wish of vr realistic golf. from the start it was mind blowing. I was a little tipsy so I played off the extremely fast pga speed greens for my inebriation. Then poof, an update comes out that fixes the insane green speed almost a week later. Poof! an update comes out that gives you more customization of your club and the stiffness you prefer. 
(hmmm I wonder if they would take a request for some sort of zoom or distance increase to see the approach shot a little better, POOF A GOD DAMN RANGE FINDER! 

The support from the devs from day one to Feb 23rd was absolutely world class. they not only responded to almost every single question asked (if it hadnt already been answerd by one of us)
but they addedrequested features sometimes almost bi weekly. I watched a very good start of a golf vr sim turn into a full fleged polished simulator in the matter of months, not years. along the way the devs have asked for feedback and even played rounds with you if the time was available. 

at first optimization was a little rough but it was such an ambitious game that I didnt bat an eye to it. at the time of this review, high end systems are basking in maxed out pure links heaven. My rig can run low with most sliders cranked up (msaa, AA) with no problem. this is the only game I own thats made me want to upgrade to a 1080 just to enjoy at full potential. 

If you are a golfer at all, and I mean putt-putt, casual, league, or rising star. you will have at least 40 to 50 hours worth of virtual "safety at home" golf that we all love but mostly cant really afford. thats for the leather puss's! HA! 

11/10 would run the leaderboard again

author: {'steamid': '76561197970148109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1486690947}
review:
Update (9-Feb-2017):

The developers have stuck with it and polished this into a very playable state. My main original complaint was of a purely technical nature, but now running on a 1070, there's the occasional slight judder, but nothing that makes it unplayable.

Super Pros:

Club Throwing simulator with no real world consequences 3000

Pros:

Essentially this is a really well thought out and playable golf sim in VR, exactly the game you want to use to show your dad VR. Lots of good courses, well thought out mechanics and UI for VR gameplay, and developers that are dedicated to making sure it works well.

Cons:

Very few at this point. Some graphical glitches can be frustrating (flickering, especially with swing playback), and bringing up swing playback sometimes fail for no obvious reason. Additionally, the greens are made of ice covered with whatever made hover cars go faster in F-Zero, which can make putting something of an exercise in frustration (hey just like real golf!).


.....




Original Review:

Could be a lot of fun if it was remotely playable. GTX 1070

Pros:
Lots of attention to details in room scale interaction, feels like a well thought out effort.
A real golf game, not just some VR cash in

Cons:
Performance is absolutely abysmal, rendering the game completely unplayable. I'm seeing some of the worst ghosting I've ever seen if I even move my head a fraction, borderline nausua inducing.

Bottom line, I'd love to give this game a shot, and feel like I'd enjoy it, but as things stand it's unplayable.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972025376', 'num_games_owned': 1072, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1496093374}

review:
While it is already exceptional, there is certainly room for additional features.   Driving range would be a great additon. 
Overall,  a great VR experience which is far more compelling than mini-golf games and with much more replay value.  Better than VR ping-pong.  Better than VR pool.  Great relaxing game when your are sick of getting rolled in FPS.    Skill level requirement feels about right- improving scores can be achieved with each round.  Very Satisfying.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966429180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1534563373}
review: This is really a great game.  I am not a real golfer, so I cannot attest to the realism of the simulation.  But I've been interested in trying out a real golf game in VR, and this one doesn't disappoint.  My only suggestion to the developers would be to add an instructor that can offer tips, suggest which club to use, and help you with your swing.  It is frustrating for somebody who knows nothing about the game to try to pick it up without any assistance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139367442', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1212, 'last_played': 1487899426}
review:
According to Steam I've spent 11 hours with the game so and I think I've gotten a good enough feel for the game to post my (still early) thoughts.

First of all - this game is fantastic.  In general, I'm blown away by how well it is done even in it's very early state.  As best I can tell, there's no detail that the dev team hasn't already thought about and most of these are already implemented into the game.  I think this is a game change and it fills a void for sim lovers who either don't have the space or the desire to do a full simulator setup.  Unfortunately this has likely ruined 2D golf for me.  I'm sure I'll still play 2D titles but this has far exceeded my expectations.

The game was just recently updated to include "sticky clubs" so that you no longer have to hold the trigger in order to hold the club in your hand.  So my thoughts below will be based on this new update since it has improved several things that were causing me some minor issues before.

Graphically - I guess it's better than expected given all the warnings I received about how VR graphics aren't great at the moment.  I think there's still some optimization to do but the fact that it's so immersive kinda overcomes any shortfalls on graphical fidelity.  This isn't an HBS issue though - it's more of the current state of this newer technology.

Immersion - this is where it's at with this game.  I can't say enough great things about it.  From the watch (which tells you the direction to the pin, wind direction, distance to the pin, stroke count, etc) to the course map in your back pocket to the golf bag it's just SO immersive.  A few cool things here:

1 - stepping over to your bag to grab your club is awesome.  There's just something cool about this that never gets old.
2 - when you find yourself at the bottom of a hill and you need to see what's up ahead so you can plan your shot, you just teleport ahead (or walk if it's a short enough distance) and take a look around.  Pick out a reference point in the distance as your aiming point, go back to your ball and take your shot.  Very realistic and very well implemented.
3 - hills, slopes, etc all work as expected.  If the ball is above my feet I have to adjust my swing both in terms of aim and in terms of club length.
4 - overall depth perception and changes in elevation are great.
5 - reaching into your bag for a ball when you need to take a drop.  Awesome.  They could've just made this a menu item but I'm glad they went the route that they did.
6 - gridless putting is WAY better than you'd think and better than anything in TGC or JNPG.  More on this later.

The swing.  The bad news on the swing is that it DOES require some adjustment from your normal real life golf swing.  I'm 98% certain that this is due to the total lack of weight (and proper distribution of weight in particular) when using the controller as your "club."  If you've played a lot of golf in real life then it will be an adjustment.  For some it seems to be a pretty wild adjustment and for others not so much.  If you don't play much real life golf then it probably won't matter.  I will say that with the latest update where you are no longer required to hold the trigger to hold your club, it makes for a MUCH more natural swing and has alleviated most of my issues with the swing interface.  Prior to this update I had to address the ball with a massively closed club face in order to ensure that my club face was square on impact.  Now I do not have to do this.  I also had to address the ball with the ball lined up on the toe of the club in order to hit it in the center of the club on my downswing.  This is no longer required.  I think now that I can hold the controller with a normal golf grip things are falling more into line with my normal swing.

The act of swinging the club in this game is fantastic!!  Just like in real life I know when I hit a bad shot without even looking at the result.  And just like in real life I have to concentrate to execute a good shot.  I've also learned that, just like in real life, if I take a practice swing (even a shortened version to ensure that my takeaway motion and follow through motions are clean) that I have much better success.  In other words - this is NOT some hokey arcade VR swing.  It's a true swing and it tracks VERY accurately.

There is no shot shaper.  You ARE the shot shaper and it works wonderfully.  I can hit any sort of shot that I can hit in real life.  

Short game - awesome.  Can't say enough good things here.  From off the green I can use my 7 iron to hit a bump and run or I can use my lob wedge or sand wedge to chip the ball.  On Casual mode (next to easiest difficulty) there is a power boost that's built into the game (this reduces in amateur mode and it goes away all together on Pro mode) and it will be obvious if you try to bump and run with a 7 iron.  But the mechanics are there and it's done VERY well.  The only issue currently is that there is too much spin on the lob wedge.  They know this and are fixing it.  But I can either close the face down a bit and hit a sharp little pitch at the pin or I can open up the face a bit and hit a loftier shot that carries further but bites harder.

Putting - awesome.  I think they have NAILED putting.  It can feel odd to putt with little to no weight and this can also cause your club head to move around a bit more (harder to control a straight motion) but once you get used to it, it's awesome.  But where putting REALLY shines is when you turn the grids off.  Holy moly!  The greens are every bit as readable as they are in real life.  I simply teleport to about 3-4 feet behind my ball, crouch down and start reading the greens.  Then, while still squatting down, I teleport up a little to read other areas as needed.  I plan my putt, teleport back to the ball and execute.  And, for me... it's spot on, dead accurate.  Playing without grids in TGC VR is the most immersive thing I've ever experience in a video game.  Drain a 20 footer for par (or better) and you'll be fist pumping like a mofo.

Things that aren't so great.

1 - Fairway bunkers.  EVERY single time you land in a fairway bunker you are penalized by roughly 50%.  So the best you can do is blast out into the fairway and drop a shot.  The devs are aware and are addressing this.
2 - Graphics but this isn't an HBS issue as much as it is a limitation of the hardware.  Although I think there is still some optimization left to be done and I know they are looking into this constantly.
3 - The setup.  VR with today's technology simply requires you to jump through a few hoops.  You've got to get your base stations mounted, you've got this huge contraption on your head with a long bundle of chords leading to your PC, etc.  It takes me about 5 minutes to setup and about 5 minutes to clean up afterwards.  With 2D golf, I just grab my controller and take off - no real setup time at all.

Things that have blown me away:
1 - The dev interaction on the steam forums.  Superb and professional
2 - The immersion of the game and the attention to details by the dev team in producing this product
3 - Putting and short game accuracy
4 - Game interface.  It could've been clunky and awkward.  Nope.  Everything flows and before you hit your 3rd hole of your first ever round you'll be comfortably navigating around without giving it a second thought.
5 - The difficulty and the clear fact that this is a sim and not an arcade game.  I haven't broken 90 yet and I'm still on casual level.  I'm a 13 handicap IRL.  Some may say that the game is harder than real life and in some aspects it's true but the more I play the better I'm getting and I expect to see more parity between my real life golf scores and TGC VR scores over time.

In general - I couldn't be more pleased.  This is probably the single best video game experience I've ever had and it's just the beginning.  BUY THIS GAME!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966638949', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1486931961}
review:
While this is clearly an Early Release game, with the latest update and the introduction of Easy mode and the Putt Preview, as well as the future of introducing player created content, this will easilly become one of THE reference VR games.

Great job so far, looking forward to the final release!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971108679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1481722241}
review:
If you love Golf in real-life (like I do) absolutely a must buy for your Vive!!!!! 

Gameplay 10/10
Graphics 8/10
Swing mechanics and physics 9/10
Immersion 10/10

Total 10/10 (if more courses make it into the final product)

If you have never tried Golf, but would like to actually do so, I'm not sure this here is the best idea, as no one will help you, there is no real golf trainer explaining everything to you, so you will get frustrating results, because "swing mechanics" and "physics" are quite close to reality from my point of view. 

So  you should already know, which club to play when, how to consider wind and most of all to keep that perfect swing. 
The Graphics are nice on "middle setting", it all looks ok. On "high settings" they look fairly good but my 780Ti creates some stuttering then. Mid level is still good enough to absolutely enjoy this game. 
Whoever owns a 1080 may certainly go to highest settings. 

If you are a Golfer in real life, this is your favourite past time during winter time!!!

I love this game, I was really blown away by the presence feeling it creates. Once my back is not aching anymore, I will definitely be on those VR courses again to hunt the eagles and birdies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147498495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1480934385}
review:
Je suis joueur de golf. Ce jeu est vraiment très bon et réaliste.
Une la prise en main un peu difficile apprivoisée c'est du pur bonheur. Mon jeu VR favori.
on s'y croirait vraiment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164837178', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1582806776}
review:
Wow this golf game really nails it! Incredible sense of realism, great controls and nice graphics makes The Golf Club VR the best golf game for Virtual Reality, no doubt! The tutorial in the beginning is very helpful, and after a few minutes you are able to start a 18-hole course, and it all feels so natural, just like in real life!

Check out this The Golf Club VR gameplay I made today, this could probably give you some idea of what this game is all about:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gyv9PcqtRzo

Just added some more VR gameplay but this time also with MIXED REALITY view, enjoy it guys:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dcw9EJalg5Q

I will continue this review after a few more hours of playing, but so far Im really impressed!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970518179', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1490208777}
review: By far the best VR golf option available as of today. This has plenty of room for additional features to add immersion (carts please!!! with ball tracker so you can drive and easily find it). Needs performance improvements but when you use Async Reprojection with SteamVR beta it runs pretty well. You can add supersampling to see further clearly and reduce stuttering when looking around. After adjusting that to your system's capabilities it is a nice looking game and a much better experience. Only problem is even though that fixes visual stuttering of the background your club stutters when looking down and to get a reliable/smooth swing you have to use lower graphics settings. Once they get performance optimized and maybe give an option for the friction level of the green (way to glassy imo) I would say this is could soon be an A+ golf game. Right now I'd give it a B. (using gtx 1070, i5 6600, 8gb ddr4)

author: {'steamid': '76561197969603431', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1595250874}
review:
WOW! wer auf Golf steht muss hier zugreifen!
Richtig gut, macht superviel Spaß.

author: {'steamid': '76561198298025584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1477298726}
review:
《高尔夫俱乐部》(The Golf Club VR)是一款模拟真实高尔夫的游戏，画面十分精致，且自由度极高，让玩家可以在其中欣赏到很多不一样的景色，弥补现实中的遗憾。
　　游戏玩法与真实高尔夫游戏十分相似，甚至在球杆上都做出了细致的区分，让玩家可以根据需要去选择，显得专业性十足。不过该游戏无法联网，无法与其他玩家一起游戏，失去了高尔夫运动的一大乐趣，只能给一些新手玩家用来练习。
　　游戏售价为78元人民币，价格虽然不高，却远比在现实中直接买一套高尔夫球杆来得划算，不过这种的高度模拟游戏对一般玩家而言，接受度不高，所以仅推荐给高尔夫运动爱好者。
　　原文地址：http://www.83830.com/game/201610/183632399.shtml
　　更多VR游戏评测：http://newgame.83830.com/

author: {'steamid': '76561198121198906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1702880015}
review: I love it! I bought it on sale and had to refund it due to my headset breaking before getting to try it. I bought it at full price now and I am loving it! Well worth the price. Especially if you played the tiger woods games on Wii back in the day. I loved those games and this within VR makes it even better. It is the golf game I was hoping would come out since first trying the VIVE. There are 3 different difficulty teirs. I shot 10-20 over par on the easiest one, so i would say its pretty realistic. I am that bad in RL but love playing nevertheless. Thanks for the VR love Devs! I look forward to see what else is coming up!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007279440', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1499275702}
review: Best VR game I've played so far...

author: {'steamid': '76561197969547291', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1630209231}
review:
Shaping up to be THE VR golf game. Already extremely playable with a handful of courses and even some putt-putt. Overall the swing mechanics feel good and the game can be just as gut-wrenching and frustrating as playing a real round of golf. Really goes a long way in making good shots feel rewarding instead of just...par for the course.

Visually it's a good looking game. That being said I think they need to put in some serious time improving overall performance. As it stands on a 980ti you are going to be playing on the lowest settings to consistently hit 90 frames. Good news is the game still looks reasonably good at that setting. 

Assuming the developers can continue to improve upon the basic functions and performance as well as delivering new courses...I foresee playing this game well into the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259749419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1477715344}
review:
I only had the chance to play through the tutorial, and took my first swing on the first course, right into my dresser.  This game needs room to swing, lol

I'll update when I have more chance with roomscale, but so far I had 0 juddering.  None at all.  Granted I ran it at lowest settings and will probably play with that more, but it was still fun enough in low detail to make me damage furniture (and nearly busted my controller).

Looking forward to playing it more.  Seems to be worth the $25 I paid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059842128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1604844423}
review:
One of my top favorite games for vr. 
hopefully you guys will add a driving range, practice green. clubs, bags and balls to unlock would be great also. and maybe something that tells you how long your shoot was. none the less tho this is one of the most impressive early access i have on the vive.  must have for any vive owner.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970710080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1505591739}
review: Very impressive already.   The look and feel is great and I look forward to futher improvements!

author: {'steamid': '76561197968761061', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1538599542}
review:
I think this is my new favorite game for listening to podcasts. I never tried real golf, but this feels really good to me.

The learning curve is pretty steep because the game is a straight up sim, but you can resolve your frustration by throwing your club.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970829767', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 1016, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1710989687}
review:
I've played quite a bit of golf in real life and this is as close as it gets in a video game to date.

What would make this game even cooler is you being able to place the tee and set the ball up yourself , and also get into a golf cart and drive to your next shot, lol, what a perfect golf game indeed.

I hope the developers consider incorporating a multiplayer after they have completed their initial goals , as this game would be so amazing with it.  Continue with the great work devs!

author: {'steamid': '76561198278904140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1700708250}
review:
Coming from that other Vive golf game, this one is on another level. Finally a game for the Vive that I want to sink a bunch of time into. I really don't mind having to hold the button down to grip the club. It feels very realistic. The moment my golf bag tipped over went tumbling into the drink, I fell in love.

It's only downfall that i really hope gets fixed? Performance. I'm running a 6700k and 980ti and can only achieve medium settings and that's with constant reprojection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198229318976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1499723234}
review:
This game is a great start, but has some room to improve:

Pros:
- Imersive environment
- decent physics (ball distance is short)
- realistic golf feel
- putting is very nice
- huge growth potential

Cons:
- must hold trigger to hold club - makes for akward grip
- graphics performance is poor (1060, 16gb, i7)
- shot distance is about 50% of real life. 
- accidental ball hits at adress (need on your honor muligans)
- no multiplayer support
- bag is easily knocked over


Suggestions for added features:

- multiplayer
- various club sets to include hybrids, different putters, etc. 
- more detailed swing analysis
- add driving range and practice area
- enter actual club length and player height 
- a golf cart would actually be really cool!

If there was a way to integrate this into a launch monitor like the GC2, Trackman, SkyTrak, etc then the ball flight physics would be improved and this could be more of a simulator quality. adding some hardware options for clubs would be great to increase the feel of the game. All in all this is a great start and I look forward to the growth of this game. Great job Devs!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198031189442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1480618381}
review: I made it through a few holes, and I can tell you this game is a lot of fun. I should say, it's fun in that it brings all the frustration I experience in real life golfing into my VR headset! It seems to be very realistic. I need more practice since it is tricky connecting with the ball in the beginning. The golf courses seem very realistic (down to wildlife, including ducks and deer). This is the first review I've done, and even though I've only played for a few minutes, I must say it's been one of the top VR games I've seen so far!

author: {'steamid': '76561198158226751', 'num_games_owned': 297, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1627851566}
review: Yeah this is going in my top 10. Really good fun, its just what i wanted.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978777659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1482684379}
review: First off this is the most complete game in VR yet it still has a ways to go.  Very fluid swing mechanics and pretty good visuals.  I am running this on a 1070 with a i7 6700 and I have to run on Medium graphics.  I do believe it needs some opimization.  Once that comes, along with multi-player, this game will amazing.  Get it now while its on sale.  VERY FUN.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977156272', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1711958331}
review:
Brilliant!  Kudos to the developers.  This game came a surprise to me as I have been intently looking for new Vive games since picking up the Vive a couplpe of months ago.  Announcing.. then three days later.. BAM  The best damn golf game on the Vive yet and more than likely for a long time.

After playing TGC on 'Flat' Screen, I never expected to see this in VR.

PROS...  IMHO
Accurate depiction of what it feels like to be 'on the course'
ball flight and physics are great
Being able to pull a club from your bag wonderful!
Course design of the three available EA courses, are fun to play and well thought out.
Free roam Via Teleport...  Brilliant idea!  Love it!
Gives you the same frustrations of hitting a bad shot as in RL

CONS
Sometimes it is hard to hit the ball if it is in a crevice or lip of a mound or something...
Could do with a little better sound design...  to immerse the player in the VR environment a little better (More SFX or variation therof)
only three courses so far, though it is only the first week and I am looking forward to more courses being available next week and into the future...
No multiplayer..   I give this game 5 stars because sit is simply fantastic and by far my best sport sim experience I have ever had, but if I could wish for one thing, it would be the ability to join a lobby and play with other golfers.  The course feels hella lonely when your trying to play a solid round..  80% of golf is the socialization, and I think to really give the game the potential it deserves would be to bring in MP..

Just my opinions...

If you like golf, this game is a MUST have if you own the Vive...  and.. I believe the price is the best value out of any game yet on the Vive..

Kudos Devs!

Fanboy right here! 

<3

author: {'steamid': '76561197970864200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1477258080}
review:
I played this game some more and got through the tutorial ok this time, It's a bit of a lonely game and would be much better if you could play multi-player, And it would benefit from a AI player to play against like Pool Nation, In fact it could do with a full tournament of players, to just knock a ball around on my own is not enough for a non golfer, but I look forward to future updates.

Previous: This is the first Vive game I have been unable to play, I am not a golf fan but I thought it would be nice to see some nice courses and environments, But the tutorial was really bad and did not work for me, it kept telling me to press advance but the game would not let me do that, once past this I started a game and I kept missing the ball, (not that blind!) It was running very poorly on my 980ti with 24 gigs of ram and a 8 core 8320, I will come back to this at a later date but for now it's a work in progress and wish the devs the best, I know its early access but if you have no real interest in golf then you best stay clear untill full release, having said that I feel I was misled by the positive reviews that were proberbly from fans of the 2d version.l
A Golf nuts game, for the time being a casuals left on the shelf.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025044594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1584315606}
review:
This is a must buy for anyone who plays golf. Had many holy **** moments, feeling like I was on a course. Even bent my knees in anguish on a few missed putts. Super imersive and the locomotion system is crisp and very functional. I love racing my shot to the green, then watching it drop from the sky with some backspin. Nice.

The amount of time the ball is in the air makes it feel like you crushed the shot, and often you do. Controling your aim and your distance are very challenging but that's good. You want there to be room for improvement and tweaks to your technique. I tried one-handed and two-handed grips. Each seems to have their place. One-handed on full shots, two handed on chips and putts. Would love to see how people grip their controller and would love to see a some small club accessories that hold the Vive controller. 

For the devs: Great work, thank you. Here are a few of my wishes:

-Driving range, chipping green and putting green so you can learn your distances and practice different swing styles.
-A line on the putter head. Would help with alignment.
-A camera option that teleports you to the spot where your ball will end up. Watching a shot land never gets old.
-Save game feature. Don't always have time for 18.
-Online, computer opponent, etc.  Not the highest priority but expected eventually. 
-Option to not have to hold the trigger while you swing. It got tiresome and limited the ways I could grip the controller.
-Show shot distance after each shot, maybe on yardage book, so you can learn your distances better.  

Looking forward to the updates. Keep up the great work!

author: {'steamid': '76561198080667598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2837, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1315, 'last_played': 1673749879}
review: This is a great and addicting game of golf.  I am an avid golfer and I can't put this game down.  So far, it is on the right track.  Keep up the good work!

author: {'steamid': '76561197999308238', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1477766165}
review: This has the potential to be a AAA title.  If they added some peripherals like a golf club controller that would be amazing.  Very calming.  Golf is a perfect fit for the vive.  Still some bugs to work out but really fun to play already.

author: {'steamid': '76561198288644587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1641933873}
review: I've played about an hour on this and I must say it's got loads of potential and I'm really enjoying it. The only issue that I have currently is the sensitivity of the putting simulation. It's massively off to the point where on some holes I'm on the green in one and then I hit my maximum shot limit trying to judge the distance of the putts. That part really needs some work.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967025397', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1515990166}
review: Great golf game for the Vive. Definitely needs some tweaks/performance optimization but overall this is exactly what I imagined an early VR golf game would be. Hope the devs keep improving it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198203335589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1665079365}
review: Based on what I see so far, I believe this game has a lot of potential. I’m about a 5 IRL, and I think while visually impressive, the games feel isn’t quite right. The distance off the clubs is all wrong relative to what I see IRL. I get that it’s hard to make the touchy stuff right, but the feel on the greens is wrong. I’ve played on a fair number of tour courses and to be honest the greens in this game are faster than anything I’ve ever seen.  Still, it looks great. I can run the game effectively on Medium Detail with a 1070, and it looks even better maxxed out, but I get the judder some others have mentioned. Hopefully there are some improvements in the efficiency department, but if not it still is very playable. As a video game it’s pretty darn good, but I think they should bring a club pro, or two, onboard to work with the feel of the game. It’s still early in the development of the game, so I believe this stuff will eventually get worked out. One thing I’d like to see is a driving range to work out the distance the clubs are going to go in the game. It’s tough to understand how on the course I hit a driver an average of 100 yards more than can find in this game. Maybe give us the ability to set the club yardages, so we can play how we play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111968299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1483721502}
review:
Took a shot and totally screwed it up as usual, saw a rabbit, threw my club at it, one dead rabbit.

10/10 Who needs a shotgun?

author: {'steamid': '76561198153671439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1679651172}
review: 지금까지 나왔던 바이브 골프게임중에 최고 나름 할만합니다. 타격감만 보안하면 좋을듯 싶어요

author: {'steamid': '76561198027809105', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1609459998}
review:
If you're looking for a full on golf experience for the Vive look no further.  The swing mechanics feel good and the haptic feedback does what it can to simulate hitting the ball.   From what I can tell so far the physics are accurate.  I suck at this just as much as I suck in real life so that must be a good sign, right?  

The issues I have are purely in performance during certain actions such as teleporting to the ball after hitting it halfway across the course or taking the map out of my pocket.  It tends to blink to the SteamVR loading screen during these instances.  Hopefully this can be worked out during early access.  

One feature I'd like to see is a marker on the map indicating where you're standing as it's easy to get disoriented teleporting to the ball and turring around IRL.

That being said it's already shaping up to be one of my favorite Vive experiences and I look forward to future updates.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081159845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1604256985}
review: Great game. Aiming a drive is tricky-- similar to real life.  Hope this translates to real world golfing somewhat. Buying golf clubs to find out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198275966991', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1605213200}
review:
Love it, and looking forward to better perforance, my 1080 is jaggy but krossing my fingers for MSAA

This will be great!

author: {'steamid': '76561198078457883', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1586631702}
review:
TGC gives a very good feel of being on a golf course.  Good sound, courses and mechanics.  I don't play golf for real, but I did enjoy some golf video games in the past.  This takes it way past tapping a button for a power meter.  I'm only using amateur difficulty, but it feels like it should for someone not experienced in the real thing.
Some really cool things:
The scoreboard behind the tee lets you see your progress after each hole
The "watch" that comes up when you twist your wrist to give you lots of cool info like distance to hole, direction, and even real time and battery of controller.
Pad you can pull out to show you the map of the hole you're on and distances to it.
Teleport around anywhere you want to go to see different views of the hole or just look around.  Then one click to return to the ball in perfect position to take your shot.
Your bag appears right by the ball to pick your club with pop ups of the type and distance you last hit using it.

Performance is fine on Low with my GTX970, jaggies on lots of stuff, but it kind of disappears after a while once you're immersed.  Hopefully they'll be able to optimize more in EA.

Definitely recommend picking up.

Update 4/2020:  Just decided to play a round and it still holds up after these few years as a great golf game.  Graphics run smooth as silk with latest grfx cards, my 1080ti has everything high and looks good.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967474960', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1477069503}

author: {'steamid': '76561197968870104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1511477548}

This is that game, it's really fun - and finally a  VR title I know I'll be spending many, many hours in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012692223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1492432493}
review:
ok, so less than 2 hrs practice with The Golf Club VR, I have the original Glof club and enjoyed it very much.
BUT! WOW! Golf, in VR! and not an arcade game either. 
be warned, there are a few bugs but hey its still early access, and you have to accept that there are going to be "issues" to work out, a couple of examples:
1: The greens are super fast. 
2: the choice of club lengths seems a bit on the short side, I'm only 5"10 and the longest seem a little short (driver seems ok, the irons seem too short).
3: some locations on certain courses leave you stranded and no way to get to your ball.

all pretty satndard teething problems for early access.
the gameplay is amazingly rewarding and fun when you get used to it. easily worth the money and it will only get better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316539098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1493798939}
review: This is a great game. I am having no frame rate problems running a GTX 1080 and i7 4790. I suck at Golf here, as in real life, so it's very realistic. The only problem I am having is, sometimes I can't hit the ball. It is really frustrating. Not sure why. It's just un-hittable, if that's a word. Any advice would be appreciated. Others aren't having this problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994024720', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1518731936}
review:
Amazing! I'd have paid good money to play golf like this years ago.. and now I can play like this in my home all I like!!

Thank you, The Golf Club VR!

The only issue is the Jittering when looking around.. made me feel kinda sick (no other game gives me that feeling and I have a lot of VR Games (60+)).. and my system is no slouch..an MSI Dominator Pro VR (Geforce 1070) and it was still jittery. Please fix the Jitter :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198025938704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1531687858}
review:
They need to fix the framerate and let you put in your own yardages on the clubs but other than that a great game.


MayorWest "Optimizations are at the top of our priority list.

Yardages are calculated averages based on your swing so you are setting your stats."

Im glad to hear that your working on optimizing it! However, you should still add adjustable yardages to the clubs because i'd like to practice hitting the ball like i'd hit it in real life. Please.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042371641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1665721568}
review: ゴルフ経験者です。と言ってもスコア100切る程度の腕前です。このゲームの凄いところはドライバーでボールを打った打感がリアルに感じられるところです。音も非常に良い。リアルゴルフではスライスがでる癖があるのですが、ゲーム内でもきっちりスライスがでます（笑）要望としては、打ちっぱなし場やアプローチの練習モードなどが欲しいですね。

author: {'steamid': '76561198085581943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1514409770}
review:
I'm a real life golfer, and I was looking forward to this release with tons of anticipation. The verdict? It's fantastic. Sure, it has some things I'd like to see tweaked, but it's buy-worthy even at this early stage of development. It's fun, satisfying, and gives you a good sense of the balance between frustration and fun that makes golf such a great game.

First of all, the sounds and haptic feedback are absolutely great. There are lots of little sounds I didn't even know I wanted in a golf VR game before now. The sounds of the grass as you skim it or pat it with your club are really immersive. The watch on your wrist and the distance book are well designed and actually very useful. The swing mechanics seem very accurate, and seem to reflect real life shot styles well. The putting feel is especially well done. I've done a few full rounds now, and my scores are pretty close to my scores in real life. Just put in a few minutes at the tutorial driving range first, and you'll get a good handle on the swing physics pretty quick.

Honestly, the only negative in this game so far is the poor performance. I have a GTX1070 and I still have to play it on the lowest graphics setting, but I expect that to change as development continues.

I simply cannot wait to play all 130,000+ courses. I'm going to play these 3 courses to death. So, hopefully those come soon. 

Great job guys.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969101080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 761, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1548976829}
review:
A great and very challenging golf simulator, this is intended to be simulative so forget to stay into the par easily, not for casual players. I'm extremely curious to see further additions, but even now (very first early access with 4 courses locked) there are plenty of holes.

Many users complains about performances, surely the game need optimizations, but I'm playing with a 970 and it's acceptable with graphics on mid (low and mid on my system runs almost the same). This game absolutely need an in game supersampling slider, it's very aliased on trees (and with antialiasing very blurry on everything distant).

I could write more on what could be added or polished, but the truth is than even now Golf Club crush any other golf game for VR. If you're interested in this sport, it's the game to buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962143904', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1617153681}
review:
If you are interested in golf, learning golf, or want the closest simulation to the real thing, this is it. Don't expect to be good at this game right away like you can in some console golf games like tiger woods. If you don't like real golf but you like golf video games, you probably won't really be a fan of this game. Some of the negative reviews will reflect this, so keep that in mind when you read them or are thinking about buying this game when you're not really a fan of actual golf.

Can't wait for more content and optimizations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062441031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1682512699}
review: Really looking forward to some updates on this game. A few  things really stand out, the yardages are soo off, 280yards with driver , but  300yds with a 3 wood? , 7 iron= 190yds!!...thats Rory country!. It would be nice if the user can eventually program in their own yardages for each club. I know the Devs want a truly immersive experience but a 'pin seeker' would be a massive help. I'm an experienced golfer and have got lost on the courses after a few wayward shots. A simple driving range would again be a great help to hone in your swing. Right now the only thing you can do is, during the tutorial ,is  dont 'advance' and keep hiting balls towards the island green (202 yards away and can be hit with a 6 iron??). I'm sure the improvements will come.Its a demanding game graphically if you want to run on High,but medium and even low are still enjoyable settings. Looking forward to some great courses as this game grows.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064046403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1576961707}
review:
Picked this up as the combination of vr and golf just seemed to be right. I have played golf games on PC and xbox with mouse swing and stick swing ( on controller ) but here as you would expect you get to stand badly, hold one vive controller and "grip" the stick by holding the trigger, then just like I have done in real life swing wildy at the ball, resulting in a complete miss or slice. 

For early access it seems quite solid no crashes so far, there is a good tutorial where you are taught the basics by "a pro" who chats you through the controls, you can then from the menu screen change settings for game play, graphics, sound etc. and select a course to play, the in-play info is neatly brought up either out of your back pocket, or from turning your wrist to look at your i-golf watch, when you hover over the clubs in your bag they show percentage chance and possible distance.

I don't play golf anymore and didn't play much but this is; the only? and so the best so far and definitley not a dissapointment for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965040685', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 455, 'last_played': 1642480426}
review: One of the best sports game experiences in VR

author: {'steamid': '76561198307923058', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1497531295}
review:
這款高爾夫值得推薦
揮桿擊球的感覺已經做得十分的擬真
唯一的缺點
跟其他VIVE的遊戲一樣
就是畫質的調教問題
試過開超採1.7+遊戲內畫質LOW
效果還可以但玩久了眼睛會很累
後來超採調到1+遊戲內畫質HIGH
玩起來就比較輕鬆一點
但是感覺上畫質還是不很理想
這也是VIVE很多遊戲的通病
不過以高爾夫的遊戲來說
這款遊戲算很值得推薦了

author: {'steamid': '76561197980605422', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1594593977}
review:
大分更新が入り変わった部分も多いので再レビュー。
VR内で気軽にゴルフ!ノーマルからサバンナや雪山等レパートリー豊富なコースがあって嬉しい、パット専用の練習コースも有。
表記されていませんが日本語にも対応済
右利き左利きの設定もあり、シャフトの長さや硬さ、グリップの握る位置の上下とかも細かく設定出来るようになった。スイングの軌道も立体的に表示できるので現実での矯正に役立つかも?
以前に書いたパターの違和感も減りプレーしやすくなったけど、やはり物理的にクラブを握っておらず、遠心力や重みが無いので違和感はあるがそこはどうしようもない。難易度の調整で飛距離や曲がりやすさ等の補正の有無の調整も出来るのでゴルフをやっている感はあると思う。
フルで18コースやると結構きついが、ラウンドの途中で中断する機能もあるので細かく進めていくことも可能（多分中断しておけるのは1コースのみ）
ずっと欲しかった飛距離やら軌道などを確認できるモードも追加された…が打ちっぱなしみたいなのを想像していたらVR内でお店とかにあるゴルフシミュレータ再現してあって不思議な感覚を味わえる。
コースは公式が推薦している物以外の（多分ユーザーが作った?）物が大量にあり、2017年の2月現在で1ページで15コースの表示で457ページ有り、それぞれが18ホールあるとしたら途方もない種類がある。ユーザースコアの高いものだけ遊んでもとても遊びつくせない程。

よく分からない要素としてゴルフカートでゴルフ場を爆走する事が出来る。意外と楽しい。狼やら熊やら鹿とかもいたりする。
楽しいけど無茶して筋を痛めてしまったのでちゃんと準備体操した方がいいと思います、買い。

author: {'steamid': '76561197999323605', 'num_games_owned': 2245, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1594326192}
review:
I've been waiting for a proper golf game for VR. And this is definitely it.

Runs great and feels great!

The only issue is that you need to hold trigger to continue to hold the club. Hopefully they change that with some sort of locking system.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016629460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1583015538}
review:
I buy a  lot of the new games that come out and unfortunately refund a lot too because most of it isnt worth a free demo download.  This is the first game that gave me back the experience of putting the headset on for the first time and let me really immerse myself.  I did not think I would like golf.  I tired the other game and it was very disappointing for me.   This was outstanding.  Great physics and swing mechanics, great extras like the virtual watch and map (Wish it was a tablet instead of a peice of paper but still great its there).  I would love a replay system or a choice of alternate camera so I can watch the swing from a different angle.   This is the first early access that feels like more effort has been put in than most of the fully released games.  I highly recommend it.   

PS if you get a little ADD while playing, i suggest getting openvr desktop display portal.  You can put a screen anywhere and wat whatever angle in the gameworld you want and watch whatever you want from your computer.  Its great since this game sets a predetermined swing direction (GREAT CHOICE) and I put my screen just to the side of the view of the main course so I can watch game of thrones reruns while playing some virtual golf.  I love my new world.  

PSS let us lock the damn clubs please DEVS!

author: {'steamid': '76561197972372180', 'num_games_owned': 903, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1539833609}
review:
8.5/10 - Amazing! Needs a few kinks worked out though.

After playing this game for an hour, I came to the realization that my Vive was worth every single penny I saved for it. Despite my frustration with how difficult the game was; I concluded that it's the closest simulation to real life golf I've ever played, and its in my own bedroom. 

Real golf is hard as hell folks, and so is this game.... But we don't play real golf because we honestly expect ourselves to be masters of it, do we? 

If you like golf, buy it... if you don't like golf, don't. If you've never played golf before or want to learn, buy the game.

^^^^OLD REVIEW^^^^

*UPDATE*
Not changing what I said about the game, and I will delete this addition when the game is updated again. Stop the money grabbing bullshit and work on it. Polish it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162099801', 'num_games_owned': 608, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1476913412}
review: Che sia una simulazione ben fatta e molto promettente è dimostrata dal fatto che un golfista scarso come me non riesca a fare buca entro il PAR nemmeno barando, a differenza dei vari giochi arcade di golf. E' già una grande soddisfazione farla, una buca, il par arriverà col tempo e la pratica. Molto coinvolgente e realistico, può solo migliorare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329163766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 4310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2848, 'last_played': 1676105209}
review:
AWESOME...AWESOME......No More Lost Balls...Want to thank the developer for coming out with this great realistic golf game...I have been a golfer for over 10 years..but don't play as often as I want...but this places me in the middle of the action...and I can play whenever I want...Only thing is I hardly ever miss the ball in my real swing with the golf club in the real golf game..but have managed to miss the ball completely and this happens a lot, really frustrating..I think mostly because unlike the real club, the controller has minimal weight and has no real feel to it.(we need a golf club controller with real weight distribution)....Also I think I got a pretty fast PC i7-6700K 32.0GB RAM GTX1080 (spent over $2K) but when I set the game to High it becomes blurry....Not sure if I need to overclock the graphics card..overall this is a great game...and its what I have been waiting for since the purchase of my VR headset..Awesome Game...

updated 1/28/2017
My Vive honeymoon is officially over...the only use I have with my Vive headset is to play "The Golf Club VR"

author: {'steamid': '76561198110849685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1692213106}
review:
Exactly what you would expect from a VR golf game, not golf in space or silly gimmicks but just a normal golf course.

After a swing you can see your swing arc and the club head angle when it hit the ball.

It worked fine on my R9 290X, I warmly recommend this game, it's a lot of fun!

Problems:
The greens are pretty fast, maybe that can be adjusted and of course the vive controller doesn't feel like a golf club.

Also you can't usually see where the hole is, although you have a compass and map, it would be better if there was an arrow in the sky or something.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986622049', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1488015660}
review:
6/10
Фанатам гольфа однозначно игра должна понравится. Реальные масштабы полей. Несколько уровней сложности (видимо на физику удара и силу ветра влияет). 
Если вы не фанат гольфа то придется разбираться какие клюшки в какой ситуации лучше подходят, чтобы нормально играть. 
Гольф мне интересен, но фанатом не являюсь, за соревнованиями не наблюдаю.
Первые полчаса меня не покидала мысль, что надо делать возврат, долго не мог уложится в лимит ударов по лунке и попасть в лунку, в итоге переход на новую лунку с  максимальным кол-вом ударов на лунку. Постепенно разобрался в клюшках (надо в инете еще почитать) и даже затянуло, теперь хотя бы в лимит более менее укладываюсь, но не всегда :)
Игра  не очень хорошо оптимизирована, на моей системе с i7/1080 играю на Low с суперсэмплингом 1.414
Судя по тому что пишут на форуме игры в Стиме все играют на Low.
С большой натяжкой ставлю палец вверх, гонять мяч по полю мне понравилось, но хочется все же чтобы с графикой поработали и к полному релизу игры бы забегала на High.

author: {'steamid': '76561198267095064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1619913490}
review:
The gameplay itself is very well done. Excellent tutorial, really polished system overall. I play golf regularly, and taking a swing in game felt so natural. The ball flew exactly as far as I suspected it to based on swing speed and club choice. I attempted a slight slice off the tee with great success. I knocked one into the sand and you really get that feel of having to put a little extra into it to chunk it out of there. Putting was nothing short of majestic, and the short game felt like the real thing. Being able to throw the clubs/bag is a nice touch because just like in real golf you'll constantly feel the need to chuck those things into the nearest lake. 

That being said, the only complaint that I have is the performance of the game. Since we're talking golf, my computer is more the John Daly of the PGA tour as opposed to Tiger Woods, however I've not experienced jutter or frame drops in any game/demo up to this point on my Vive.  Upon firing the game up for the first time the jutter was so bad it would have had lesser men seizing on the floor and vomiting blood. I promptly exited the game, and bumped the setting down to low, and still experienced a pretty significant amount of jutter. At this point it's pretty unplayable for me on my i5 6500 and GTX 1060 even on the low setting, so if you have specs similar to mine you may want to hold off till the frame rate gets lined out.

Also as mentioned in some other reviews this is "tailor made" for multiplayer, and would be an amazing experience to get a group together and go out and play on the course.

Overall if the performance is fixed, this is an absolute must have. Physics are spot on, and it's everything you'd want out of a golf game. It's a surreal feeling to swing in VR and see the ball go exactly as you wanted it, likewise knowing you absolutely duffed one and for that to be reflected as well. Solid 10/10 if the frame rate becomes playable with my setup.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106208804', 'num_games_owned': 929, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1553533243}
review:
This is good implementation of golf in VR. The tutorial gets you off to a good start and the controls are intuitive.

Your golf bag is standing just in front of you and you hover your hand over the clubs to make your selection. Initially, the yardage for a club is blank, but once the game knows how far you personally hit that club, it's remembered for next time. One thing I might like to see added in this aspect of the game is the ability to choose to toggle holding the club or map as opposed to having to hold the trigger the whole time.

The map in your back pocket is good for seeing the overall hole and checking distances (the dots are 50 yards apart as a guide). Your watch has handy info, too. Haptic feedback is well-done; you know if you're in the right spot to grab your map and you can feel the ground with the clubhead before you swing.

The teleporting system is nice. You can zip straight to a stance in front of your ball, or choose to walk along the course and take in the scenery. Reviewing your swing in 3D afterwards is pretty cool. It's like it draws your swing with TiltBrush and you can see how smooth you were and how far back the backswing was.

The graphics look great even on low settings, IMO. I get better performance from this game on higher settings than I do in Pool Nation VR, for example. The golf glove texture on the Vive controller is a nice touch. Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057482550', 'num_games_owned': 1103, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1478042026}
review:
Picked this up today as always wanted a golf game for the Vive. Played just over 2 hours so thought I would share my 2 cents.

Pro's:
They have got the swing and clubs down to a tee. The swing mechanic feels really good and there is a swing review after your shot so you can see your back and forward swing.
The menu system works great, good tutorial and set of options.
Added lots of nice touches such as watch to show you the direction and distance to the flag. You can pick the club bag up and move it, animals (strange animations), sounds the club makes against the ball tells you if its a good shot or not.

Cons:
Performance, performance, performance. I am running it on 1080 with i7 4790K and 16Gb and it needs rear projection on low settings. It seems to be course dependant as played all the courses and the third one was able to play on high settings with no stutter (but rear projection was on all the time)
The greens are like glass and are far too fast. The first course is really bad for this.
The ball physics on the crazy golf section are well off. 
Difficult to make out objects in the distance such as flag, ball in flight. Should have a different indication system.
When the game launches it has a windows menu to select several settings. Means you need to go to desktop each time to set it before the game begins in vr.

Improvements:
Need to see how far you have hit the ball.
Really needs a driving range so you can practice.
Multiplayer is a must!! And not the crap they put in the desktop version.
Graphics need an improvement. Would prefer not to have trees as the antialising just makes everything shimmer.

Final thoughts:
The best golf VR experince you can have at the moment.  It is a dream for golfers, it is like the real thing, nothing more kothing less.Very impressed with the vive integration. This game has lots of promise and could be a must have if they iron out the issues before full release. At the moment its a 6 out of 10 for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021063355', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1476902469}
