author: {'steamid': '76561198030557760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 148, 'last_played': 1477219475}
review:
I am not a massive golf fan but have enjoyed golf games in the past and the graphics looked like at the very least I could enjoy a tranquil virtual stroll :-)

So...FORE!!!!... I played two rounds on two different courses before writing this review and can report that I am about as bad at this as I am at real golf, but I bloody loved every single second of it, for me it is as addictively difficult as the real thing...and I am pretty sure that is a good thing.

Am running a 980Ti and found the highest quality setting produced a laggy framerate, but all looked good for me on the medium setting.

Am really looking forward to continuing to play on other courses and seeing all the tweaks and improvements planned by the developer, I encourage you to support this game and join the community, I think this is a VR keeper you will want to play time and time again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334926946', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1476900862}
review: brand new PC i5 6550 with HTC Vive, Geforce 1060 6GB and I couldnt run this game at a High Frame rate (from the menu within the VR screen) it juddered really badly. Selected the Medium option which stopped the judder but from a Tee I couldn't make out detail well enough to plan shots.  Gameplay with controller was good, although I set me room space and direction for swing I kept having problems centering. Not convinved my investment in the gasme was a good one, unless I am missing a bunch of settings ? on the fence but have recommended (just) in the hope others have better settings/experience

author: {'steamid': '76561198308044035', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 148, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1477583280}
review:
待ちに待ったゴルフゲー。数ホールまわったところでのレビューとなります
日本語未対応と書かれていますが一部文字は日本語対応がされています(右利きとかドライバーとか)
当方リアルでゴルフはしないのでリアルに近いかどうかの評価はできませんが非常に爽快感のあるゲームです。
これまでやってきたゴルフゲーによくある力ゲージやら打つ方向の調整やら自動でクラブ変更してくれたりとかありません
パター一つにしてもとても難しいがそれが楽しい(空振りが多発するとちょっとイライラする)
移動はワープ方式とリセットでボール前に移動
不満点を挙げるとするならば
・リセット時のボールとの距離の調整が欲しい
・クラブを持つ場合はトリガーをずっと引いとかないと落としてしまう
・カップの位置がわかりずらい(のろしとか上がってるとわかりやすいかも)
もしかしたら設定できるところがあるけど見つけられてないのかもしれません
まずはクラブの使い分けから覚えていく必要がありそうですね・・・
後はフルスイングするため周りの環境はちゃんと整えた方がいいです

author: {'steamid': '76561197970349825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1488998368}
review:
Great experience so far! The graphics are good for VR, I got a 980Ti and use Medium to get stable 45fps retroprojection framerate. I am sure it will improve over time.

I play golf in real life too and I have to say the physics is pretty cool at the moment. My biggest complain is the need to keep the grip button pressed to hit the ball. This is a very poor choice in my opinion as it brings alot of tension in your fingers.
I struggle to make powerful shots so far, I just hit a 200 yards drive compared to what I can hit in real life (around 250 yards, I play stiff Titleist irons). The feeling to "be there" on the course is very cool!!
Now, we just need multiplayer in real time like Pool Nation VR does and it will be a great social experience for sure!

So far, this looks promising... let's give these guys a chance :)

To summ it up:

PROS:
-Immersion and the "be on the course" feeling
-The bag where you can pick your clubs up
-Physics seems on the good rails
-Seems like we will get a huge library of courses to play on

CONS:
-No "social" multiplayer planned ?! Really ?!
-Keeping the grip button pressed to swing is plain horrible
-Quite hard to hit powerful shots (I might get used to it)
-Bag is too close when you teleport to the ball, I feel like I don't have enough space to hit my ball :)
-Performance which will improve I hope

author: {'steamid': '76561197973483579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1477487387}
review:
This is a really good attempt at a golf sim, if you don't like golf you may not like this game.  If you like golf I see no reason why you would not.  I'm a poor golfer in real life (happy with <100) and it turns out im really bad in VR too, but here I can throw my clubs around and swear without getting disapproving looks!   The game is challenging and requires practice to get better, just like the real thing.  Only thing missing is the 19th hole!

Devs are active the community hub and listen to feedback.  I think this game has a great future

WARNING ON SPACE: This is the first game I have been fearful for my monitor and I would suspect the game could be very frustrating if you don't have much space.  I have 2.5x2.5 meters and feel im right on the limit of picking a club from the bag, addressing the ball and hitting it.  You could teleport to the bag/pick up club/teleport back if you dont have enough room

author: {'steamid': '76561198009205516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2087, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1582340902}
review: VR Golf makes a lot of sense.  This is the first, or furthest along, attempt at a true golf sim.  Controls, bugginess etc. must be improved, but it is great.  There is such a thing as blading in this game - and i do it all the time.  I wish I could get some air under that ball.  Not sure if its my swing or the in game physics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117044719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1487965321}
review: I really like this game, I'm not a golf player but I'm always enjoying these kind of games with gamepad and now I can play a real golf match in VR. The ambience, graphics, ball physics, etc,... are really good, but I have a complaint about the performance of the game. I have a Pc with an i7 6700, GTX 1080 and 16Gb Ram and I can not set the visual graphics in high. If I put the visual graphics in medium sometimes the game starts to judder then I have to change the visual settings to Low. Please devs improve the performance of the game. Another thing is that the player has not any visual help, if you try to find where the green is, the player needs to check the map or teleport around the field, for skilled players this is very good, but for noob players like me, this makes the game be a bit too hard. The same with the clubs, I don't know the average yardage with any of them, then as a sugestion for CASUAL mode, help the noob players with more info please.
